arm_group.description: evaluation of Lava Plus zirconia dental crowns and bridges

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this work is to study in-mouth aging and LTD of monolithic zirconia
      restorations. Microstructural changes characteristic of LTD processes, wear, and clinical
      behaviour following standard parameters will be evaluated. Notably Raman spectroscopy and 3D
      laser surface analysis will be used, directly on the restorations, which will be removed at
      regular intervals.The working hypothesis is that LTD process is very slow at the scale at
      the lifespan of dental prostheses.

clinical_study.brief_title: Y-TZP and In-mouth Low Thermal Degradation A Prospective Clinical Study
clinical_study.condition: Zirconia Monolithic Dental Crowns and Bridges In-vivo Behaviour and Ageing.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Full zirconia crowns in the posterior region (molar/premolar)

          -  On teeth or implants

          -  Single unit restorations cemented on natural teeth and implants (including
             screw-retained restorations if possible, but no internal connections)

          -  Multi-unit restorations on implants

          -  If nightguard: to be performed on the antagonist

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with removable prosthesis as an antagonist

intervention.description: Zirconia monolithic dental crowns and bridges evaluation

facility.name: Institute of Dentistry University of Liege

clinical_study.official_title: Y-TZP and In-mouth Low Thermal Degradation: A Prospective Clinical Study

primary_outcome.measure: Zirconia monolithic restorations in-vivo and in-vitro evaluation

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
